title: Adverse news pummels Indiabulls Housing Finance stock. Will the bulls return soon?
text:
The Delhi High Court has sent a notice to the promoters on a PIL seeking a probe into the charges of giving dubious loans and misappropriation of funds. The negative news flow may make it difficult for the management to raise fresh funds. It also comes at a very inopportune time for the company — when it’s making a case for a merger with Lakshmi Vilas Bank.
